name: Hello Human
description:
Play against a mischievous AI intent on learning about humans through a variety of puzzle and skill games.

-------------------------------------

Full game available on Android and iOS from 8th May 2020 (Links available on release)

***CONTEST***

Enjoyed playing this demo? Enjoy the funeral at the end? 

Share this demo on twitter (don't forget to mention @kinorogames) and I will pick 1 lucky winner to have a blue ball named after them!
